INT_TYPE  base 
)

Rounds an integer to the next multiple of another integer.

Template Parameters:
INT_TYPE The integer type
Parameters:
to_reach The integer to be rounded up (ceil operation)
base The base
Returns:
The smallest multiple of 'base' such that to_reach <= base
